meanings.definition: Utmost or most extreme effort or degree.
meanings.sent1: She tried her durndest to finish the race.
meanings.sent2: He put his durndest into studying for the exam.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel tried its durndest to reach the acorn on the tall tree.
meanings.sent4: The team gave their durndest to win the championship.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter's durndest saved the kitten from the burning building.

meanings.definition: Used for emphasis or to express surprise or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: Durndest! I can't believe you did that!
meanings.sent3: Durndest, that magician pulled a rabbit out of a hat!
meanings.sent4: When she saw the surprise party, she exclaimed, 'Durndest!'
